content: a court in trapani has issued a final resolution after a 4year legal process the defendants request for a reduction in the application was rejected and declared inadmissible the court also declared the succession of the deceased parties and granted the request for collation of real estate the defendant was ordered to pay a certain amount of money to the plaintiff and the interveners were also ordered to pay a separate amount the court ordered the dissolution of the community inheritance and the division and sale of a specific property through auction the court considered the arguments and evidence presented by the parties and made decisions based on the applicable laws the judgment was made by the civil section of the trapani court on december 7 2021
